current_options.label: In-Bay Automatic (IBA)
current_options.description: Vehicle stationary, machine moves over it. Common at gas stations.

current_options.label: Express Tunnel
current_options.description: High-speed conveyor, exterior-only, 80-180 feet. High volume focus.

current_options.label: Mini-Tunnel
current_options.description: Shorter conveyor under 60 feet. Smaller lots.

current_options.label: Self-Serve Bay
current_options.description: Wand wash - customer performs labor with high-pressure hoses.

current_options.label: Gantry / Truck Wash
current_options.description: Heavy-duty frame system for trucks and large vehicles.
